user_query: I'm planning a hiking trip with my friends and we need some adventure-themed music. Can you suggest a playlist with energetic songs to keep us motivated during the hike? Additionally, provide information about the local hiking trails and any interesting trivia facts about the area.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a playlist of energetic adventure-themed songs suitable for hiking.
Fetch details about the local hiking trails, including difficulty levels, lengths, and highlights.
Gather interesting trivia facts about the area where the hiking will take place.
